optimize API reference¶

Optimizers¶

class optimize.optimizers.Maximizer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Optimizer

Trait.

Construct for the base optimization class.

class optimize.optimizers.Minimizer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Optimizer

Right now, just a node in the type tree that offers no additional functionality.

Construct for the base optimization class.

class optimize.optimizers.Optimizer(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

An base optimizer class.

obj¶

The objective function object.

Type

ObjectiveFunction, optional

options¶

The options dictionary, with keys specific to each optimizer.

Type

dict

Construct for the base optimization class.

compute_obj(pars)¶

A wrapper to computes the objective function. This method may further take in any number of args or kwargs, unlike the compute_obj method.

class optimize.optimizers.Sampler(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Optimizer

Base class for mcmc samplers.

Construct for the base optimization class.

class optimize.neldermead.IterativeNelderMead(alpha=1.0, gamma=2.0, sigma=0.5, delta=0.5)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Minimizer

A class to interact with the iterative Nelder Mead optimizer.

Construct for the base optimization class.

compute_obj(x, subspace_index=None)¶

A wrapper to computes the objective function. This method may further take in any number of args or kwargs, unlike the compute_obj method.

init_params()¶

Initialize the parameters

Args:

class optimize.scipy_optimizers.SciPyMinimizer(method='Nelder-Mead', options=None)¶

Bases: optimize.optimizers.Minimizer

A class that interfaces to scipy.optimize.minimize.

Construct for the base optimization class.

compute_obj(pars)¶

Computes the objective.

Parameters

pars (np.ndarray) – The parameters to use, as a numpy array to interface with scipy.

Returns

The objective.

Return type

float

optimize()¶

Calls the scipy.optimize.minimize routine.

Returns

The optimization result.

Return type

dict
